name: Robin
0:
”Alexa, is this room free?”
”Alexa, who booked this room?”
”Alexa, find a room.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Robin is workplace experience software that powers conference room scheduling, desks, office maps and insights for thousands of modern offices. To get started, create an AWS account and access Alexa for Business. Next, enable the skill in Alexa for Business, link your Robin account, and add this skill to a skill group to enable it for your rooms. Read about Alexa for Business here: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/a4b/latest/ag/what-is.html
